com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities

Class StringUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.StringUtilities

  • public class StringUtilities
extends Object
    Provides utility methods related to strings.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • join

        public static String join(Object... parts)
        Joins parts of an array together to form a string.
        Parameters:
        parts - the parts to join
        Returns:
        the string that is formed when all given parts are joined together
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parts is null

      • humanise

        public static String humanise(String text)
        Humanises a camel cased text. Each individual word will be written in lower case (unless it's in upper case in the input text) and separated with spaces. The first word will be capitalised.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to humanise
        Returns:
        a humanised version of the given text

      • camelCase

        public static String camelCase(String text)
        Turns a text into camel case. Each word (apart from the first one) will be capitalised; after that, all of the words will be joined.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to turn into camel case
        Returns:
        a camel-cased version of the given text
